ED67E13F14734A93BA22191FAA55AA9C.description: In response to unseen texts, considering the ways in which a text’s meaning is shaped by conventions of form alongside those of language and style.

574859A9EF5D40A892BEF238F5EA98F5.description: the dramatic qualities of play texts.

6301013442CC4398BF5D733A9FAA275E.description: how parts of the text relate to the work as a whole • the dramatic qualities of play texts.

5FF933AC0B69455199602052C1A6F188.description: the language and style of texts • the effective use of narrative methods • how parts of the text relate to the work as a whole • the dramatic qualities of play texts.

F954BBBB449B4C42A4AB1D263DC36896.description: the ways in which writers’ choices of form, structure and language shape meanings • the language and style of texts • the effective use of narrative methods • how parts of the text relate to the work as a whole • the dramatic qualities of play texts.

CBE4D196CD16423BB4CA4445C88D9074.description: Evaluating and explaining different ideas within a text:

38A0BD30FFF248F5B9ED2CA748500C5D.description: Analysing the ways in which choices regarding form, structure and language interact to create a distinctive style, for different forms and genres.

15CBC407B3814CD9B853342899489426.description: Exploring the relationship between a text and its historical, social and cultural backgrounds and the ways in which this can illuminate the reading of a text.

DC16A352B44D4082951014A3DFEB962B.description: Exploring the characteristics of different text types: for example, tragedy, comedy and satire.

3035845E82BD4DEBB5E17E54DDAAD5B0.description: When used in writing: the construction of a relevant and supported argument appropriate to the question.

86E65101BBAD44FD8E8AD4B9634DA781.description: When analyzed in reading: the organization of a text or passage, its shape and development and how this contributes to the readers’ understanding of its meaning and effects.

58BA32A2F6204AF6B780E2CC00FE0CBF.description: Considering the ways in which writers use – or depart from – conventions of literary forms of drama and how those inform meaning and effects.

DDF263BF62564BF5B9CBFBAC01A91A9D.description: Considering the ways in which writers use – or depart from – conventions of literary forms of  poetry and how those inform meaning and effects.

F938BBED933045D6A4936B9188FB2496.description: Considering the ways in which writers use – or depart from – conventions of literary forms of prose,  and how those inform meaning and effects.

3329CC9CD18549F68D548CECC3E48230.description: Considering the ways in which writers use – or depart from – conventions of literary forms of prose, poetry and drama and how those inform meaning and effects.

D260B98A77774393BE054C889657D02E.description: Explaining how literary techniques contribute to a reader’s analysis and understanding of the text.

6BC407BB5E07417582774601CE031121.description: Identifying literary techniques and explaining how their use contributes to a reader’s analysis and understanding of the text.

985A5B55A4ED4BB6B1280D8F31754853.description: Language - Exploring the variety and use of language in literary texts.
